rukus.text: Wa Qala Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'A'idha Kunna Turabaan Wa 'Aba'uuna 'A'inna Lamukhrajuna
Laqad Wu`idna Hadha Nahnu Wa 'Aba'uuna Min Qablu 'In Hadha 'Illa 'Asatiru Al-'Awwalina
Qul Siru Fi Al-'Arđi Fanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Mujrimina
Wa La Tahzan `Alayhim Wa La Takun Fi Đayqin Mimma Yamkuruna
Wa Yaquluna Mata Hadha Al-Wa`du 'In Kuntum Sadiqina
Qul `Asa 'An Yakuna Radifa Lakum Ba`đu Al-Ladhi Tasta`jiluna
Wa 'Inna Rabbaka Ladhu Fađlin `Ala An-Nasi Wa Lakinna 'Aktharahum La Yashkuruna
Wa 'Inna Rabbaka Laya`lamu Ma Tukinnu Suduruhum Wa Ma Yu`linuna
Wa Ma Min Gha'ibatin Fi As-Sama'i Wa Al-'Arđi 'Illa Fi Kitabin Mubinin
Inna Hadha Al-Qur'ana Yaqussu `Ala Bani 'Isra'ila 'Akthara Al-Ladhi Hum Fihi Yakhtalifuna
Inna Rabbaka Yaqđi Baynahum Bihukmihi Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Al-`Alimu
Innaka La Tusmi`u Al-Mawta Wa La Tusmi`u As-Summa Ad-Du`a'a 'Idha Wa Llaw Mudbirina
Wa Ma 'Anta Bihadi Al-`Umyi `An Đalalatihim 'In Tusmi`u 'Illa Man Yu'uminu Bi'ayatina Fahum Muslimuna
Wa 'Idha Waqa`a Al-Qawlu `Alayhim 'Akhrajna Lahum Dabbatan Mina Al-'Arđi Tukallimuhum 'Anna An-Nasa Kanu Bi'ayatina La Yuqinuna
